content.author: TrashFixed
content.body:
你們那邊有下雨喔…羨慕
好熱…

content.author: 二夜子
content.body:
TrashFixed 有
단목명연 騙人的ㄅ

content.author: 단목명연
content.body:
二夜子
I’m singin’ in the rain
Just singin’ in the rain
What a glorious feeling
I’m happy again.
I’m laughing at clouds.
So dark up above,
The sun’s in my heart
And I’m ready for love.

content.author: TrashFixed
content.body:
二夜子 騙人的ㄅ

下雨天超讚ㄉ…
